title: Samantha Ross
text: Hi there! My name is Samantha and I am a fourth-year undergraduate student at UCSB, majoring in Environmental Studies. When I am not in class or rolling bagels at my job, I like to read, make art and good food, play music with my sister, and explore Santa Barbara with my friends.

title: Books
text:
Here are all the books I have read this school year! I <3 reading :)












Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood



Gifted



By Rebecca Wells

















The Serviceberry



New



By Robin Wall Kimmerer

















Oryx and Crake



Gifted



By Margaret Attwood

















Half Asleep In Frog Pajamas



Used



By Tom Robbins

title: Oryx and Crake
text: My friend Ailish gave me this book in high school. I didn’t read it til now. It is one of her favorites.

title: The Serviceberry
text: I read this book for Professor Lisa Sideris’ Nature Spirituality course this spring quarter.

title: Half Asleep In Frog Pajamas
text: I first read “Still Life With Woodpecker” and got hooked on Tom Robbins and his whimsical, philosophic writing. I found this gem at Paperback Alley in Old Town Goleta.

title: Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood
text: My grandma, Martha Ross, passed away a couple years ago. My grandpa wanted me to look through her things and take what I wanted. I chose this book because it looked worn and loved. It makes me feel closer to her, seeing the pages she dog-eared.
